scripts.publish: npm run build-all && npm run postbuild:latest && lerna publish --conventional-commits
scripts.publish:next-prerelease: npm run build-all && npm run postbuild:next && lerna publish prerelease --preid next --dist-tag next --pre-dist-tag next --conventional-commits
scripts.publish:next: npm run build-all && npm run postbuild:next && lerna publish --preid next --dist-tag next --pre-dist-tag next --conventional-commits
scripts.postbuild:next: git commit -m "chore(docs): build docs" && git push origin next
scripts.postbuild:latest: git commit -m "chore(docs): build docs" && git push origin next
